sub_title: Actor, Singer, Voice Teacher. Now accepting students worldwide via ZOOM
summary:
I've been acting and singing all my life, and teaching since 2014. I am based in Amsterdam, Netherlands but take students worldwide via ZOOM.

Graduated Notre Dame de Namur University (Belmont, CA) in Spring, 2015 with a BFA in Music (Vocal Performance). 

In addition to my University training, I was the Teaching Assistant to a master voice teacher in San Francisco from 2009 to 2015. In 2015 I launched my own voice studio working with actors and singers from across the Bay Area. I’m excited to be working with singers and actors on both sides of “the Pond”.

Specialties: Singing, Acting, Teaching, Coaching, Musical Direction, Writing/Editing/Proofing, Organization (of time, people, and things).

treasury_media.title: John RInaldi: Actor, Singer, Voice Teacher, Voice Coach
treasury_media.description: Check out my website for more info on my experience and training, sample my work on audio and video, and get more information on studying voice with me.

projects.title: Starting Here, Starting Now
projects.description: The Jewel Box Musical Theater is proud to present Maltby and Shire’s hit off-Broadway show “Starting Here, Starting Now” at venues in the Netherlands and Germany. Please check out our web site for performance dates and locations.

contributors.headline: Actor, Singer, Voice Teacher. Now accepting students worldwide via ZOOM

projects.title: Not Just a Phase
projects.description:
“Not Just a Phase” is the story of my life from Birth to Beetser, told through personal stories mixed with songs of the great leading ladies (and gentlemen) of the musical theater. 

Please, won’t you come to this lovely, socially-distanced venue and let me sing for you? There’s something for every musical theater fan, from “The Sound of Music” to “Jesus Christ Superstar”, to “Yentl” to “Nine” and everything in between. 

The show is Sunday, October 31 at 3:30pm.

contributors.headline: Actor, Singer, Voice Teacher. Now accepting students worldwide via ZOOM

projects.title: Little Shop of Horrors Online Cabaret
projects.description: Please tune in to see me as Mr. Mushnik in Tenacious Theatrics' online production of Little Shop of Horrors Online Cabaret. We are now streaming for FREE online, on-demand, any time you wan!!!!. We are doing the complete score of this beloved sci-fi/horror/Motown/camp classic show, along with props, costumes, puppets and one very homicidal extraterrestrial plant! Free of charge, but you can donate to help support Tenacious' mission of Keeping Art Alive. All proceeds will be split between the cast and the creatives. And whatever you do, DON'T FEED THE PLANTS!

projects.title: "He Said/She Said" at the Society Cabaret, San Jose"
projects.description: Come and see my first ever cabaret show on June 17 at the Society Cabaret in San Jose. Daniel Lockert will be at the piano, and guest vocalists Annmarie Martin and Scott Stewart will lend their talents. Come hear some of my favorite songs from both sides of the Broadway gender divide!

projects.title: Crossroads Life
projects.description: “Crossroads Life” is a short film directed by Andra Tevy, and written by Emilia Bunea. It started life as a case study for graduate students, presented cinematically, with a strong script/storyline and a colorful cast of characters. However, a few film festivals (and awards) later, it has crossed over into the general Short Films category. Follow Clara as she comes from Romania to Amsterdam to manage a challenging team. Clara has to find ways to connect with each team member, including Oliver, the tax man who has been with the company “forever”, and bursts into song given the slightest provocation. Oliver is very resistant to Clara’s management style at first, but if you watch the film you’ll see how she wins him over…and also takes a few tools from his toolbox as well. Seems old Oliver actually is a pretty savvy team player.

courses.name: Master Class for Singers, Mendocino Music Festival

profile_positions.description: I give private voice lessons in Musical Theatre voice technique. I also assist with audition preparation and learning roles, and teach artists how to pick the right material for their casting type.  I also love helping singers grow into singing actors.
profile_positions.title: Voice Teacher, Owner

company.name: Theaters and Cabarets in the US and Europe

profile_positions.company: Theaters and Cabarets in the US and Europe
profile_positions.description: Between January of 2012 and March of 2017, I performed in productions at Tri Valley Repertory Theatre (Livermore), Contra Costa Musical Theatre (Walnut Creek), Palo Alto Players, Woodminster Summer Musicals (Oakland), Hillbarn Theatre (Foster City), Foothill Musical Theatre (Los Altos), Coastal Repertory Theatre (Half Moon Bay) and Broadway By the Bay (Redwood City). I have also performed two one-man shows at the Society Cabaret in San Francisco and San Jose. More recently I performed my one man show at the world famous Don’t Tell Mama in NYC and the Sausalito song society. During the pandemic I kept busy with virtual and film projects including “Little Shop of Horrors Online Cabaret” (currently streamable on demand), and “Clara at Crossroads”, a short film currently in post-production, shot on location in Amsterdam. Presently working on my first live Netherlands performance, at the Kerk van Beets, which is set for October 31.
profile_positions.title: Actor/Singer

profile_positions.description: I worked part-time as the Operations Coordinator for Breakthrough New York, an educational non-profit. As the OC, I ran the front office, hired and managed vendors, administered our G-Suite and Salesforce platforms, helped with Employee training and onboarding, and coordinated Board meetings and Staff Retreats.
profile_positions.title: Operations Coordinator

profile_positions.description: As a staff music director for Hillbarn Conservatory. I MD'd "Willy Wonka, Jr."​ , "13", "You're a Good Man Charlie Brown"​, "Into the Woods",​ "The Stinky Cheese Man", "Sleeping Beauty" and "The Frog Prince".
profile_positions.title: Music Director

volunteer_experiences.description: In addition to my office work at BTNY, i love volunteering as an interviewer, meeting the kids who apply to our program. I also have done mock job interviews for our 9th and 10th graders.
